analysis.core.interfaces¶

Source: src\analysis\core\interfaces.py

Module Overview¶

Core interfaces for the analysis framework.

This module defines abstract base classes and protocols that establish the contract for analysis components, ensuring consistency and extensibility across the framework.

Complete Source Code¶

  1#======================================================================================\\\
  2#========================== src/analysis/core/interfaces.py ===========================\\\
  3#======================================================================================\\\
  4
  5"""Core interfaces for the analysis framework.
  6
  7This module defines abstract base classes and protocols that establish
  8the contract for analysis components, ensuring consistency and extensibility
  9across the framework.
 10"""
 11
 12from __future__ import annotations
 13
 14from abc import ABC, abstractmethod
 15from typing import Any, Dict, List, Optional, Protocol, Union, Tuple
 16from dataclasses import dataclass
 17from enum import Enum
 18import numpy as np
 19
 20
 21class AnalysisStatus(Enum):
 22    """Status of analysis operations."""
 23    SUCCESS = "success"
 24    WARNING = "warning"
 25    ERROR = "error"
 26    INCOMPLETE = "incomplete"
 27
 28
 29@dataclass
 30class AnalysisResult:
 31    """Base class for analysis results."""
 32    status: AnalysisStatus
 33    message: str
 34    data: Dict[str, Any]
 35    timestamp: Optional[float] = None
 36    metadata: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None
 37
 38    def is_success(self) -> bool:
 39        """Check if analysis was successful."""
 40        return self.status == AnalysisStatus.SUCCESS
 41
 42    def has_warnings(self) -> bool:
 43        """Check if analysis has warnings."""
 44        return self.status == AnalysisStatus.WARNING
 45
 46    def has_errors(self) -> bool:
 47        """Check if analysis has errors."""
 48        return self.status == AnalysisStatus.ERROR
 49
 50
 51class DataProtocol(Protocol):
 52    """Protocol for simulation data."""
 53    times: np.ndarray
 54    states: np.ndarray
 55    controls: np.ndarray
 56
 57    def get_time_range(self) -> Tuple[float, float]:
 58        """Get time range of the data."""
 59        ...
 60
 61    def get_sampling_rate(self) -> float:
 62        """Get average sampling rate."""
 63        ...
 64
 65
 66class MetricCalculator(ABC):
 67    """Abstract base class for metric calculators."""
 68
 69    @abstractmethod
 70    def compute(self, data: DataProtocol, **kwargs) -> Dict[str, float]:
 71        """Compute metrics from simulation data.
 72
 73        Parameters
 74        ----------
 75        data : DataProtocol
 76            Simulation data containing times, states, and controls
 77        **kwargs
 78            Additional parameters for metric calculation
 79
 80        Returns
 81        -------
 82        Dict[str, float]
 83            Dictionary mapping metric names to values
 84        """
 85        pass
 86
 87    @property
 88    @abstractmethod
 89    def supported_metrics(self) -> List[str]:
 90        """List of metrics supported by this calculator."""
 91        pass
 92
 93    def validate_data(self, data: DataProtocol) -> bool:
 94        """Validate input data for metric calculation."""
 95        if not hasattr(data, 'times') or not hasattr(data, 'states'):
 96            return False
 97        return len(data.times) > 0 and len(data.states) > 0
 98
 99
100class PerformanceAnalyzer(ABC):
101    """Abstract base class for performance analyzers."""
102
103    @abstractmethod
104    def analyze(self, data: DataProtocol, **kwargs) -> AnalysisResult:
105        """Perform performance analysis.
106
107        Parameters
108        ----------
109        data : DataProtocol
110            Simulation data to analyze
111        **kwargs
112            Analysis-specific parameters
113
114        Returns
115        -------
116        AnalysisResult
117            Comprehensive analysis results
118        """
119        pass
120
121    @property
122    @abstractmethod
123    def analyzer_name(self) -> str:
124        """Name of the analyzer."""
125        pass
126
127    @property
128    @abstractmethod
129    def required_data_fields(self) -> List[str]:
130        """List of required data fields for analysis."""
131        pass
132
133
134class FaultDetector(ABC):
135    """Abstract base class for fault detection systems."""
136
137    @abstractmethod
138    def detect(self, data: DataProtocol, **kwargs) -> AnalysisResult:
139        """Detect faults in the system.
140
141        Parameters
142        ----------
143        data : DataProtocol
144            Real-time or batch data for fault detection
145        **kwargs
146            Detection-specific parameters
147
148        Returns
149        -------
150        AnalysisResult
151            Fault detection results including status and diagnostics
152        """
153        pass
154
155    @abstractmethod
156    def reset(self) -> None:
157        """Reset detector state for new analysis."""
158        pass
159
160    @property
161    @abstractmethod
162    def detector_type(self) -> str:
163        """Type of fault detector."""
164        pass
165
166
167class StatisticalValidator(ABC):
168    """Abstract base class for statistical validation."""
169
170    @abstractmethod
171    def validate(self,
172                data: Union[List[Dict[str, float]], np.ndarray],
173                **kwargs) -> AnalysisResult:
174        """Perform statistical validation.
175
176        Parameters
177        ----------
178        data : Union[List[Dict[str, float]], np.ndarray]
179            Data for statistical validation
180        **kwargs
181            Validation-specific parameters
182
183        Returns
184        -------
185        AnalysisResult
186            Statistical validation results
187        """
188        pass
189
190    @property
191    @abstractmethod
192    def validation_methods(self) -> List[str]:
193        """List of validation methods supported."""
194        pass
195
196
197class VisualizationGenerator(ABC):
198    """Abstract base class for visualization generators."""
199
200    @abstractmethod
201    def generate(self,
202                analysis_result: AnalysisResult,
203                **kwargs) -> str:
204        """Generate visualization from analysis results.
205
206        Parameters
207        ----------
208        analysis_result : AnalysisResult
209            Analysis results to visualize
210        **kwargs
211            Visualization-specific parameters
212
213        Returns
214        -------
215        str
216            Path to generated visualization file
217        """
218        pass
219
220    @property
221    @abstractmethod
222    def supported_formats(self) -> List[str]:
223        """List of supported output formats."""
224        pass
225
226
227class ReportGenerator(ABC):
228    """Abstract base class for report generators."""
229
230    @abstractmethod
231    def generate_report(self,
232                       analysis_results: List[AnalysisResult],
233                       **kwargs) -> str:
234        """Generate comprehensive analysis report.
235
236        Parameters
237        ----------
238        analysis_results : List[AnalysisResult]
239            List of analysis results to include in report
240        **kwargs
241            Report generation parameters
242
243        Returns
244        -------
245        str
246            Path to generated report file
247        """
248        pass
249
250    @property
251    @abstractmethod
252    def report_formats(self) -> List[str]:
253        """List of supported report formats."""
254        pass
255
256
257# Factory protocols for creating analysis components
258class AnalyzerFactory(Protocol):
259    """Protocol for analyzer factories."""
260
261    def create_metric_calculator(self, calculator_type: str, **kwargs) -> MetricCalculator:
262        """Create a metric calculator of specified type."""
263        ...
264
265    def create_performance_analyzer(self, analyzer_type: str, **kwargs) -> PerformanceAnalyzer:
266        """Create a performance analyzer of specified type."""
267        ...
268
269    def create_fault_detector(self, detector_type: str, **kwargs) -> FaultDetector:
270        """Create a fault detector of specified type."""
271        ...
272
273    def create_statistical_validator(self, validator_type: str, **kwargs) -> StatisticalValidator:
274        """Create a statistical validator of specified type."""
275        ...
276
277
278# Configuration protocols
279class AnalysisConfiguration(Protocol):
280    """Protocol for analysis configuration."""
281
282    metrics_config: Dict[str, Any]
283    performance_config: Dict[str, Any]
284    fault_detection_config: Dict[str, Any]
285    validation_config: Dict[str, Any]
286    visualization_config: Dict[str, Any]
287
288    def validate(self) -> bool:
289        """Validate configuration parameters."""
290        ...
291
292
293# Analysis pipeline interfaces
294class AnalysisPipeline(ABC):
295    """Abstract base class for analysis pipelines."""
296
297    @abstractmethod
298    def add_analyzer(self, analyzer: Union[PerformanceAnalyzer, FaultDetector, StatisticalValidator]) -> None:
299        """Add an analyzer to the pipeline."""
300        pass
301
302    @abstractmethod
303    def run_pipeline(self, data: DataProtocol, **kwargs) -> List[AnalysisResult]:
304        """Run the complete analysis pipeline."""
305        pass
306
307    @abstractmethod
308    def get_summary(self) -> AnalysisResult:
309        """Get summary of pipeline results."""
310        pass
311
312    @property
313    @abstractmethod
314    def pipeline_name(self) -> str:
315        """Name of the analysis pipeline."""
316        pass
317
318
319# Context manager for analysis sessions
320class AnalysisSession(ABC):
321    """Abstract base class for analysis sessions."""
322
323    @abstractmethod
324    def __enter__(self) -> 'AnalysisSession':
325        """Enter analysis session context."""
326        pass
327
328    @abstractmethod
329    def __exit__(self, exc_type, exc_val, exc_tb) -> None:
330        """Exit analysis session context."""
331        pass
332
333    @abstractmethod
334    def add_data(self, name: str, data: DataProtocol) -> None:
335        """Add data to the session."""
336        pass
337
338    @abstractmethod
339    def run_analysis(self, analysis_type: str, **kwargs) -> AnalysisResult:
340        """Run analysis on session data."""
341        pass
342
343    @abstractmethod
344    def export_results(self, format: str = 'json') -> str:
345        """Export session results."""
346        pass

AnalysisResult¶

Base class for analysis results.

Source Code¶

 1@dataclass
 2class AnalysisResult:
 3    """Base class for analysis results."""
 4    status: AnalysisStatus
 5    message: str
 6    data: Dict[str, Any]
 7    timestamp: Optional[float] = None
 8    metadata: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None

15        """Check if analysis has warnings."""
16        return self.status == AnalysisStatus.WARNING
17
18    def has_errors(self) -> bool:
19        """Check if analysis has errors."""
20        return self.status == AnalysisStatus.ERROR

Inherits from: ABC

Source Code¶

 1class ReportGenerator(ABC):
 2    """Abstract base class for report generators."""
 3
 4    @abstractmethod
 5    def generate_report(self,
 6                       analysis_results: List[AnalysisResult],
 7                       **kwargs) -> str:
 8        """Generate comprehensive analysis report.
 9
10        Parameters
11        ----------
12        analysis_results : List[AnalysisResult]
13            List of analysis results to include in report
14        **kwargs
15            Report generation parameters
16
17        Returns
18        -------
19        str
20            Path to generated report file
21        """
22        pass
23
24    @property
25    @abstractmethod
26    def report_formats(self) -> List[str]:
27        """List of supported report formats."""
28        pass

AnalysisPipeline¶

Inherits from: ABC

Abstract base class for analysis pipelines.

Source Code¶

 1class AnalysisPipeline(ABC):
 2    """Abstract base class for analysis pipelines."""
 3
 4    @abstractmethod
 5    def add_analyzer(self, analyzer: Union[PerformanceAnalyzer, FaultDetector, StatisticalValidator]) -> None:
 6        """Add an analyzer to the pipeline."""
 7        pass
 8
 9    @abstractmethod
10    def run_pipeline(self, data: DataProtocol, **kwargs) -> List[AnalysisResult]:
11        """Run the complete analysis pipeline."""
12        pass
13
14    @abstractmethod
15    def get_summary(self) -> AnalysisResult:
16        """Get summary of pipeline results."""
17        pass
18
19    @property
20    @abstractmethod
21    def pipeline_name(self) -> str:
22        """Name of the analysis pipeline."""
23        pass

AnalysisSession¶

Inherits from: ABC

Abstract base class for analysis sessions.

Source Code¶

 1class AnalysisSession(ABC):
 2    """Abstract base class for analysis sessions."""
 3
 4    @abstractmethod
 5    def __enter__(self) -> 'AnalysisSession':
 6        """Enter analysis session context."""
 7        pass
 8
 9    @abstractmethod
10    def __exit__(self, exc_type, exc_val, exc_tb) -> None:
11        """Exit analysis session context."""
12        pass
13
14    @abstractmethod
15    def add_data(self, name: str, data: DataProtocol) -> None:
16        """Add data to the session."""
17        pass
18
19    @abstractmethod
20    def run_analysis(self, analysis_type: str, **kwargs) -> AnalysisResult:
21        """Run analysis on session data."""
22        pass
23
24    @abstractmethod
25    def export_results(self, format: str = 'json') -> str:
26        """Export session results."""
27        pass
